short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension that makes YouTube video controls always visible

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension enhances your YouTube viewing experience by allowing you to position the video controls outside of the video player screen, making them always visible and easily accessible. With this extension, you can toggle between the default YouTube control settings and the 'always visible' mode, ensuring that you never have to hover over the video to access the playback controls. This feature provides a more convenient and uninterrupted viewing experience, especially useful for those who frequently adjust video settings. 

You can view a demo of the Chrome extension here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F97oSr3-rFE

How does AlwaysVisible work? 
- After installing the extension and pinning it to the extension bar, browse to a YouTube video
- Open up the extension by clicking the extension icon
- To toggle the YouTube UI controls, click the toggle in the extension sidepanel
- Toggle it back after you're finished!
